channel.title: My server just shut down after i unplugged the router
channel.description: Ok, my server wouldn't work...so I turned router off and on, then it worked. then it stoped working again, so i restarted router again.....then it completely stopped working for good. any ideas?

item.title: My server just shut down after i unplugged the router
item.dc:creator: @Zaron Zaron
item.description:
@Zaron wrote:

gh, you shouldn’t really do that. Were you hosting the server for players to get on or just a 1 player game? If the 1 player, it doesnt connect to the internet but if it was hosting, you should really turn off your router unless there’s a connection problem with your actual internet connection… You may need to portforward… (and add the port to your frewall)

Read full topic
item.source: My server just shut down after i unplugged the router

then it stoped working again, so i restarted router again…then it completely stopped working for good. any ideas?
